meanings.definition: The emission of light without heat as a result of the absorption of radiation
meanings.sent1: The phosphorescence of the glow-in-the-dark stars lit up the room softly.
meanings.sent2: The cave was filled with a gentle phosphorescence that illuminated the walls.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous firefly giggled at its own phosphorescence in the dark.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a phosphorescence that brightened even the gloomiest days.
meanings.sent5: The deep sea creatures shimmered with a mystical phosphorescence.
